mapper.select: SELECT tr.RECIPE_ID, tr.RECIPE_TITLE, tr.RECIPE_WRITER, tr.RECIPE_PATH1, tr.RECIPE_VIEW, tr.RECIPE_BODY, (SELECT COUNT(*) from TB_RECIPE_LIKE trl WHERE trl.RECIPE_ID = tr.RECIPE_ID) AS RECIPE_LIKE, (SELECT COUNT(*) from TB_RECIPE_COMMENT trc WHERE trc.RECIPE_ID = tr.RECIPE_ID) AS RECIPE_COMMENT FROM TB_RECIPE tr WHERE tr.RECIPE_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR tr.RECIPE_BODY LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ORDER by tr.RECIPE_CREATE DESC

SELECT td.DAILY_ID, td.DAILY_TITLE, td.DAILY_WRITER, td.DAILY_PATH, td.DAILY_VIEW, td.DAILY_BODY, (SELECT COUNT(*) from TB_DAILY_LIKE tdl WHERE tdl.DAILY_ID = td.DAILY_ID) AS DAILY_LIKE, (SELECT COUNT(*) from TB_DAILY_COMMENT tdc WHERE tdc.DAILY_ID = td.DAILY_ID) AS DAILY_COMMENT FROM TB_DAILY td WHERE td.DAILY_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR td.DAILY_BODY LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ORDER by td.DAILY_CREATE DESC
